name: Bottom View Perspective
description:
Get early access to build and test build, be able to try all epochs and test them by yourself on Patreon or contact me for support on Discord

To support me you can buy me a coffe at https://ko-fi.com/antonioriolo

Recommended settings:

  • Make sure you are aware on the usage instructions of LORA

  • CFG Scale : 5 to 10

  • LORA weight for txt2img: reccomended 0.4-0.9.

  • Keys: bottom_view, photo_from_bottom, upskirt

Very  simple to use, just use the keywords, i advice to use togheter bottom_view, photo_from_bottom with a weight like 1.3 should work most of the times.

I used double keyword to give more chance to generate from this perspective as in training images.

upskirt it's self explanatory, should be used togheter with the other 2 when you want to see under skirt.

I used 0.5-0.6 weight in the model for these images, when it doesn't work you might force it with an higher weight but you will probably end up with distorted faces, but you can fix that by inpainting them and then for inpaint cut out this model just to draw properly the face.

Works with both realistic and anime images.

Enjoy!

If you'd like to support my efforts and have access to early and bleeding edge builds, please think about joining my Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/betterCuteAsians
